# The `BulkPublic` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This struct is equivalent to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/publicsym32">codeview::PublicSym32</a>, but it has been optimized for size to speed up bulk serialization and sorting operations during PDB writing. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::pdb::BulkPublic</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This struct is equivalent to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/publicsym32">codeview::PublicSym32</a>, but it has been optimized for size to speed up bulk serialization and sorting operations during PDB writing.

Definition at line 108 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/pdb/include/llvm/debuginfo/pdb/native/gsistreambuilder-h">GSIStreamBuilder.h</a>.
